answers.answer: he should ask his parents to make an appointment with his pediatrician. there could be something more serious with his heart. or the weight could be putting strain on it. for him being overweight he should also be tested for diabetes.

question: hi my cuz 12 years old and he weights 210 lbs he say when he walk his heart hurts I told him its because is heart is not use to working that hard but just to make sure im asking you guys so what is it? and what should he do?
title: being fat
